div.pre:
NOTES: [ Pricing Type ] Standard : Using total ticket price from vendor. From NTA : Start pricing from NTA price from pricing provider. From Sales : Start pricing from Sales price from pricing provider.
[Currency] If not set (empty), it will be applied for all currencies.

NOTES: Use comma for the separator of each values: A,B,C,D. Or you can define one value
Input Example : V,S,Y,B,J,I

NOTES: Use comma for the separator of each values: A,B,C,D. Or you can define one value
Input Example : YR,D5,G7

NOTES: Use comma for the separator of each values: A,B,C,D. Or you can define one value
Input Example : QQ1KTFITVALUEB,QQ3KFVITVALUEA

[ Agent Tax Commission to HO ] Commission Tax : Input value < 0 or will be ignored.
Provider Commission -> from Provider Pricing Agent Commission -> Sales - NTA Agent HO Commission -> NTA Agent - NTA
Example : Tax Percentage : -10 Agent Commission : 50,000 Provider Commission : 35,000
Result : Tax : 50,000 x -10% = -5,000 New Agent Commission : 50,000 - 5,000 = 45,000 New Provider Commission : 35,000
*) Agent Commission for the agent will be 45,000 *) 5,000 fee will be added to HO *) There will be no change with the Provider Commission 35,000

[ HO Tax Commission ] Commission Tax : Input value > 0 or will be ignored.
Provider Commission -> from Provider Pricing Agent Commission -> Sales - NTA Agent HO Commission -> NTA Agent - NTA
Example : Tax Percentage : 10 HO Commission : 70,000 Agent Commission : 5,000 Provider Commission : 1,000
Result : Tax amount : 70,000 x 10% = 7,000 New HO Commission : 70,000 + 7,000 = 77,000 New Agent Commission : 5,000 - 7,000 = -2,000 New Provider Commission : 1,000 - 2,000 = -1,000 Auto Upsell : 1,000
*) HO will receive 70,000 + 7,000 commission fee *) 7,000 will be charged from Agent Commission for the agent *) Agent Commission will be 5,000 - 7,000 = -2,000 *) If there are due amount from the Agent Commission, Due amount will be charge from Provider Commission 1,000 - 2,000 = -1,000 *) If there are due amount from the Provider Commission System will be auto upsell the ticket price as the due amount Ticket will be upsell 1,000

[ Agent Tax Commission to HO ] Commission Tax : Input value < 0 or will be ignored.
Provider Commission -> from Provider Pricing Agent Commission -> Sales - NTA Agent HO Commission -> NTA Agent - NTA
Example : Tax Percentage : -10 Agent Commission : 50,000 Provider Commission : 35,000
Result : Tax : 50,000 x -10% = -5,000 New Agent Commission : 50,000 - 5,000 = 45,000 New Provider Commission : 35,000
*) Agent Commission for the agent will be 45,000 *) 5,000 fee will be added to HO *) There will be no change with the Provider Commission 35,000

[ HO Tax Commission ] Commission Tax : Input value > 0 or will be ignored.
Provider Commission -> from Provider Pricing Agent Commission -> Sales - NTA Agent HO Commission -> NTA Agent - NTA
Example : Tax Percentage : 10 HO Commission : 70,000 Agent Commission : 5,000 Provider Commission : 1,000
Result : Tax amount : 70,000 x 10% = 7,000 New HO Commission : 70,000 + 7,000 = 77,000 New Agent Commission : 5,000 - 7,000 = -2,000 New Provider Commission : 1,000 - 2,000 = -1,000 Auto Upsell : 1,000
*) HO will receive 70,000 + 7,000 commission fee *) 7,000 will be charged from Agent Commission for the agent *) Agent Commission will be 5,000 - 7,000 = -2,000 *) If there are due amount from the Agent Commission, Due amount will be charge from Provider Commission 1,000 - 2,000 = -1,000 *) If there are due amount from the Provider Commission System will be auto upsell the ticket price as the due amount Ticket will be upsell 1,000
